close_door.description: Close the oven door by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

clean_opened_door.description: Clean the opened door to remove dirt and debris.

open_door.description: Open the oven door by pulling it down.

clean_closed_door.description: Clean the closed door to remove dirt and debris.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to select the desired setting.

wipe_knob.description: Clean the knob to ensure it rotates smoothly.

wipe_oven_body.description: Clean the oven body to remove cooking residue.

clean_whole_oven.description: Clean the entire oven, including the door and knob, to maintain performance.
